170150.「でも あなたは\n 持ち物が いっぱいだッチ！\n<br>\n「持ち物を いっ:
But you're full of stuff! Leave them, sell
them, and then come back!<end>

170151.「大変だッチ！ このふっかつのじゅもんに\n 入っていた ユーシャさまのお名前が:
Oh, no! I can't read Usha's name that was included in this Spell of Life properly! I have no choice but to name it "Eleven" for
now!

170152.「どの像が ほしいッチ？\n この中から ひとつだけしか渡せないから\n ホント:
Which statue do you want? I can only give you
one of these statues, so choose carefully
which one you really want!<break>

170153.「あ！ 今 渡したもので\n オイラのお仕事が 全部完了したッチ！\n ありがと:
Oh! With what I just gave you, all my work is done! Thank you!I was going to leave after work, but there's a nice breeze here! So I'm going to stay here and play some more! ... If you're not too
busy, why don't you go and have a chat with me?

170154.「えっ オイラが見えるッチ？\n もしかして あなたは この世界の\n ユーシャ:
What? You can see me? Are you, by any chance,
the Usha of this world?<yesno><break>

170155.「他にご用は あるッチか？\n<break>: Is there anything else I can do for you?<break>

170156.「ふっかつのじゅもんについて\n 説明するッチ！\n<br>\n「ふっかつのじゅ:
I'll explain about the power of life! The Spell of Fulfillment is a mysterious power that will bring about a flood of records and
other things related to Usha! As Usha's adventure progresses, the items contained in the grocery list will change in spectacular
ways! Do you want to know how you can get your hands on the elixir of life? The Art of Survival doesn't exist here in Astoltia! No
matter how hard you search, you'll never find it! In the other world, Lotto Zetasia, you can find the Luck Spell! You should go there
too! By the way, the Luck Spell is also used outside of Lotozetasia, but I can't cast it, so be careful! I hope you can get your hands
on one of the Luck Spells made in Lotto Zetasia!

170157.<select_se_off>\nふっかつのじゅもんについて\nお礼について\n:
<select_se_off>
About the Wisdom of Life
About Thank You
About Cruch
<select_end>
<break>

170158.「オイラに 質問ッチ？\n 何が聞きたいんだッチ？\n<break>:
You have a question for me? What do you want
to ask me?<break>

170159.「オイラから渡す お礼について\n 説明するッチ！\n<br>\n「時の化身であ:
I'll explain what I'm going to give you! When I, the incarnation of time, recite the Lifatsuke-Jujutsu, an amazing vault called
the Vault of Eternity will open! The Vault of Eternity is in a different world, and inside it are records of Usha's exploits and other
things. I've come to Astoltia to spread the records of Usha's exploits in Lotto Zetasia that are contained in the Vault of Eternity!
... But the trouble is, I forgot that my appearance was originally only visible to a limited number of people. And I also forgot
to remember the Survival Technique that I needed to open the Vault of Eternity! I was in trouble, but then you appeared in front of
me, with your mysterious aura! You saved my life! In order to finish my work, I desperately need the Gem of Survival made in
Lotos Zetasia! If you use it to open the Vault of Eternity, all of its contents will be given to you! I'm counting on your help!

170160.「これはまだ あなたに渡すことは\n できないッチ！\n<br>\n「新しい ふ:
I can't give this to you yet! I might be able
to give it to you if you teach me a new
survival skill!<end>

170163.「これはもう\n あなたに 渡してあるッチ！\n<end>: I've already given this to you.<end>

<pipipi_off>I can now receive <%sL_COLLABO_ITEM> thanks
to the power of the Lifesaving Spell!<me_60>
<pipipi_on><end>

<select_se_off>
pass the word of life
Get a thank you
Listen to the explanation
<select_end>
<break>

170166.「この ふっかつのじゅもんには\n 『<%sL_JACK_NAME1>』っていう:
This Lifesaving Spell is inscribed with Usha's name, <%sL_JACK_NAME1>! Would you like to change the heart of <%sL_JACK_NAME2> that
you can receive now so that you can receive it under the name of <%sL_JACK_NAME1>?

170167.「じゃあ やめとくッチね！\n<br>\n「別のお名前で ほしい場合は\n 今の:
I'll stop then! If you want a different name,
you'll have to use a different life skill
than the one you have now!<end>

170168.<pipipi_off>\nふっかつのじゅもんの チカラにより\n『<%sL_J:
<pipipi_off>Now you can receive the Heart of
<%sL_JACK_NAME1> through the power of the
Spell of Survival!<me_60><pipipi_on>
<end>

170169.「あれ？ このふっかつのじゅもんに\n 入っていたお名前は 『<%sL_JACK:
Huh? The name contained in this spell is <%sL_JACK_NAME1>, the same name as <%sL_JACK_NAME2>'s heart! If you want to
change the name of <%sL_JACK_NAME2> to the name of another Usha, use a different Luck Spell!

170170.「よく来たッチ！\n 何かご用は あるッチか？\n<break>:
Welcome to the party! What can I do for you,
sir?<break>

170171.「受け取りたいものを 選ぶッチ！\n<break>: Pick the one you want to receive.<break>

173556.「……うーん？ でもユーシャさまとは違う\n 何か特別で とっても不思議なオーラ:
... Hmm? But unlike Usha, there's something special and very magical about you. You have a very strange aura, and I need your help
with something! I am Kurucci of the Yotch tribe! I'm Kurucci of the Yotch tribe! I'm also known as the incarnation of time, and
I'm kind of cool! If you happen to have a Spell of Survival made in Lotto Zetasia somewhere, I want you to teach it to me! I'll
give you something special related to Lord Usha of Lotos Zetasia if you tell me about it! I would like you to help me with this
important task that the Elders have asked me to do! I beg you! So, let's get to work!

173558.「オイラのことが 知りたいッチ？\n そんなことが 知りたいなんて\n あなた:
You want to know about me? You must be pretty strange to want to know something like that, huh? I am Kurucci of the Yotch! The Yochi are
a tribe that watches over the course of time, and are also known as the incarnation of time! It is our mission to pass on the
exploits and achievements of Lord Usha in the various worlds to future generations! This time, the elders of the Joch tribe have asked
me to spread the exploits of Usha and the others in Lottozetasia in Astoltia! I'll be staying in this town for a while, so come to
me when you have the Luck Spell!

176933.「またオイラと お話するッチ！\n 待ってるッチ！\n<end>: I'll talk to you again! I'll be waiting!<end>

179564.「この『<%sL_JACK_NAME1>の心』には\n ロトゼタシアの ユーシャ:
This Heart of <%sL_JACK_NAME1> is inscribed with the name of Lord Usha of Lotos Zetasia! If you wish to change this name to a
different one, please tell me the lifesaving power of a different Usha! That way, the heart of <%sL_JACK_NAME1> will have another
Usha's name! You can change your name as many times as you like until you receive the Heart of <%sL_JACK_NAME1> from me! Remember that!

181561.「ユーシャさま『<%sL_JACK_NAME2>』の\n お名前が刻まれている:
Mr. Usha, would you like to receive
<%sL_JACK_ITEM> in its current state with the
name <%sL_JACK_NAME2> engraved on it?<yesno_2><close>

183046.「………。\n<br>\n「……あなたに 伝えてもらった\n ふっかつのじゅもん:
... ... The words of the Buddha that you had given me echoed in vain as a mountain echo! I was so moved by how the echoes sounded! Thank
you for telling me! Please play with me again when you're free!

183047.「……え？\n ふっかつのじゅもんを\n まだ 教えてくれるッチ？\n<br>\:
... What? Are you still going to tell me the secret to success? Even if you tell me, I don't think anything will happen, okay? Even
so, will you tell me?

183048.「ふっかつのじゅもんを 教えてくれて\n ありがとうッチ！\n<br>\n「……:
Thanks for teaching me the secret to success, Michi! ... But I couldn't use it to open the Vault of Eternity anew! What a pity! I'd like
to have a new luck charm that'll allow me to be more active in Usha-sama's adventures in Lotto Zetasia!

183050.「あなたに 教えてもらった\n ふっかつのじゅもんの チカラで\n こんなものが:
With the power of the magic you taught me, I
was able to bring out something like this!<end>

183052.「ロトゼタシア製の ふっかつのじゅもんを\n 手に入れたッチ？\n オイラに 教:
Did you get the Spell of Survival from Lotto
Zetasia? Please tell me!<end>

183132.「ふっかつのじゅもんを 教えてくれて\n ありがとうッチ！\n<br>\n「……:
Thanks for teaching me the secret to success, Michi! But... But I've already been able to open the Vault of Eternity and retrieve
everything in it! Would you like to change the name on the heart of <%sL_JACK_NAME2> to the name of another Usha? If so, then you'll
need another Life skill that's more advanced than Usha's adventure! I'll do my best to get the Spell of Survival made in Lotto Zetasia!

183207.「やめるッチ？\n もしかして 『<%sL_JACK_NAME2>の心』を\n:
You don't want to? Do you want the Heart of <%sL_JACK_NAME2> in another Usha's name? If so, I'd like you to teach it to another Usha
who's had just as many adventures! That way, the Heart of <%sL_JACK_NAME2> will have another Usha's name on it! You can change
your name as many times as you like until you receive the Heart of <%sL_JACK_NAME2> from me! Remember that!

183262.「でも あなたは\n そうびぶくろが いっぱいだッチ！\n<br>\n「そうびを:
But you're full of sobekuros! You'll have to
leave it, sell it, and then come back!<end>
